Title: Kevi Rite Jaish
Writer: Abhinay Banker (script associate), Abhishek Jain (story,  screenplay & dialogue), Anish Shah (story,  screenplay & dialogue)
Actors: Tom Alter, Abhinay Banker, Raju Barot, Rakesh Bedi
Plot: The film is a satire on the fascination, nay, obsession of the Patels - a Gujarati farmer community - of migrating to the USA. Over the last half a century lakhs of Patels have migrated to ...
